DOC.brief_summary: This long-term safety study Phase 2 subject choose remain Exubera® ( inhaled insulin ) .
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Safety Study Inhaled Insulin : An Up Four-Year Extension Therapy Subjects With Type 1 Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: The study terminate Oct. 18 , 2007 . This study post approval commitment study . Pfizer decide cancel new trial decision withdraw Exubera® ( inhaled insulin ) due lack market performance safety reason .
DOC.criteria: Subjects Type 1 Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus participate previous Phase 2 extension protocol Smoking Pregnancy
